name: Straight Arm Lat Pulldown With Bar
description: Isolates the lats by keeping the arms straight, promoting back width and strength.

name: Pull-Up (Assisted)
description: Engages the lats with assistance, making pull-ups more accessible while building back strength.

name: Pull-Up (Band)
description: Utilizes a resistance band to assist in performing pull-ups, focusing on lat activation.

name: Chin Up
description: Targets the lats, biceps, and upper back with a palms-up grip, emphasizing pulling strength.

name: Lat Pulldown With Pronated Grip
description: Focuses on the lats and upper back using an overhand grip, ideal for developing width.

name: Lat Pulldown With Supinated Grip
description: Engages the lats and biceps with an underhand grip, promoting lat contraction and strength.

name: Single Arm Cable Row
description: Targets the lats unilaterally with cable resistance, improving back symmetry and strength.

name: Single Arm Lat Pulldown (Band)
description: Isolates each lat individually using band resistance, promoting balance and unilateral strength.

name: Single Arm Lat Pulldown
description: Allows focused lat activation by pulling down one arm at a time, improving muscle symmetry.

name: Pull-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that activates the lats and upper back, promoting overall back strength.

name: Bent Over Barbell Row
description: Strengthens the lats and upper back by pulling a barbell towards the torso while bent over.

name: Straight Arm Lat Pulldown With Rope
description: Engages the lats with a rope attachment, emphasizing a wide range of motion for full contraction.

name: Chin-Up (Weighted)
description: Builds strength in the lats and biceps by adding weight to chin-ups for increased resistance.

name: Iso-Lateral High Row
description: Targets the lats and upper back through an isolated, machine-supported rowing movement.

name: Iso-Lateral Low Row
description: Isolates the lats and lower back with a low row movement, enhancing pulling strength.

name: Kneeling Pulldown
description: Focuses on the lats by performing pulldowns in a kneeling position, increasing stability and range.

name: Pull-Up (Weighted)
description: Adds weight to traditional pull-ups for advanced lat and upper back strength development.

name: Iso-Lateral Row
description: Engages the lats and middle back through an isolated rowing motion, improving pulling power.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: Strengthens the lats and middle back by pulling a cable handle towards the torso while seated.

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
description: Isolates each lat individually by rowing a dumbbell towards the hip while supporting the body with the other arm.

name: T-Bar Row
description: Targets the lats and middle back by lifting a T-bar towards the chest from a bent-over position.

name: Inverted Row
description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the lats and upper back by pulling the chest towards a bar while suspended.

name: Close-Grip Lat Pulldown
description: Emphasizes the lower lats by pulling down with a close grip, enhancing back thickness.

name: Wide-Grip Pull-Up
description: Targets the lats and upper back with a wide grip, promoting back width and strength.

name: Meadows Row
description: A unilateral exercise that targets the lats using a landmine setup, enhancing back thickness.

name: Landmine Row
description: Engages the lats and middle back by rowing a barbell anchored at one end, promoting unilateral strength.

name: Underhand Barbell Row
description: Targets the lats and biceps by rowing a barbell with an underhand grip, enhancing lower lat development.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: Engages the lats and chest by lowering a dumbbell behind the head while lying on a bench.

name: Straight Arm Lat Pulldown (Cable)
description: Isolates the lats by pulling a cable bar down with straight arms, focusing on lat activation.

name: Decline Dumbbell Pullover
description: Enhances lat and chest engagement by performing pullovers on a decline bench.

name: Cable Close Grip Seated Row
description: Targets the middle back and lats using a close grip for improved contraction.

name: Cable Wide Grip Seated Row
description: Emphasizes the upper back and rear delts with a wide grip.

name: Dumbbell Row
description: Works the lats and rhomboids with unilateral dumbbell movement.

name: Inverted Row with Underhand Grip
description: Focuses on the lats and biceps using an underhand grip for added tension.

name: Seal Row
description: Engages the lats and middle back using a chest-supported rowing motion.

name: Seated Machine Row
description: Isolates the middle and upper back muscles with machine-guided resistance.

name: Bent Over Row (Band)
description: Works the back and lats using band resistance for dynamic rowing.

name: Chest Supported Incline Row (Dumbbell)
description: Targets the lats and upper back while minimizing lower back strain.

name: Renegade Row
description: Combines rowing and core engagement with alternating dumbbell rows in a plank position.

name: Kroc Row
description: A high-rep, heavy dumbbell row focusing on building upper back and grip strength.

name: Gorilla Row
description: Targets the lats, traps, and core with alternating dumbbell rows.
